parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: Limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: ResourceDirectoryAccountId
parameters.description:
The Alibaba Cloud account ID of the member in the resource directory.

>  You can call the [DescribeMonitorAccounts](~~DescribeMonitorAccounts~~) operation to obtain the IDs.

parameters.name: RiskId
parameters.description:
The baseline ID.

>  You can call the [DescribeCheckWarningSummary](~~DescribeCheckWarningSummary~~) operation to query the baseline IDs.
